overview:
Chip is a co-founder of, and COO for Digital Containers, spending the last decade focused on ways to deliver rich and valuable content over the Internet in a safe, efficient, and profitable fashion.

Chip is a career entrepreneur specializing in electronic communications, DRM, teamware, and social networking technologies for Standard and Poors, Coleman Research, and the Gerson, Lehrman Group.

Chip maintains both business and technical specialties including: Digital Rights Management, Collaboration/teamware applications, social networking and eCommerce

Chip is a listed patent holder on many of the patents used for secure distribution and monetization of digital goods in distributed networks. He is a respected thought leader in the unique business model known as Superdistribution.

Chip is a charter member of the DCIA.
